name: Volt-Oscillatron
description: Volt-Oscillatron is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a unique combination of traits. Its box has a classic design, reminiscent of vintage electronic devices. The buttons on its control panel are arranged in a soldier pattern, giving it a disciplined and organized appearance. Its arms and legs are designed to resemble a cat, with sleek and agile movements. The screen on its front displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, captivating the attention of anyone who looks at it.
